meta.title: Ritual Text Related to the Deity of the Maṇḍala

nodes.title: Ritual Text Related to the Deity of the Maṇḍala
Description
nodes.body: Perhaps this is simply the ritual of self-generation (bdag bskyed) and the generation and consecration of the maṇḍala = dkyil ‘khor sgrub pa? No free-standing texts with this title.
